overview: Peanut, This girl loves peanut butter with everything, especially cum! Tyla, Has a thing for men in a uniform. Heather, Is searching for a father figure, with a big cock! Gia, What do you do when your best friend has sex with your father? Why watch and masturbate of course! You won't want to miss this movie. It is probably Jim Powers' best movie yet, and it will be winning many awards. It's incredible! And hey, everyone loves to watch schoolgirls get fucked up the ass.
tagline: These naughty seniors want to graduate with a bang!
title: School Girls
